00078 //----------------------------------------------------------
00079 void
00080 GrPolygonBSPTree::Build( const GrPolygonGroup& hullPolygons, const GrPolygonGroup& propPolygons,
00081                                                  GrPolygonUberUVMapper& mapper, bool calcPVS, bool uberTexture,
00082                                                  float uberTexelsPerMeter )
00083 {
00085         Clean();
00086 
00088         if ( hullPolygons.GetPolygonCount() > 0 )
00089         {
00090                 _root = new GrPolygonBSPSplit( hullPolygons, propPolygons, mapper, calcPVS, uberTexture, uberTexelsPerMeter );
00091 
00093                 BuildLeafVector();
00094 
00096                 const unsigned int leafCount = ( unsigned int )_leaves.size();
00097                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < leafCount; ++i )
00098                 {
00099                         if ( calcPVS )
00100                                 _leaves[ i ]->CompressPVSData( _leaves );
00101                         else
00102                                 _leaves[ i ]->CalcPVSAllVisibleIndices( leafCount );
00103                 }
00104         }
00105         else
00106         {
00107                 _root = new GrPolygonBSPSplit();
00108         }
00109 }
00110

00115         _root->GetUberTexData( dataArray );

00118 //----------------------------------------------------------
00119 void
00120 GrPolygonBSPTree::Load( UReader& reader )
00121 {
00123         Clean();
00124 
00126         _root = new GrPolygonBSPSplit( reader );
00127 
00129         BuildLeafVector();
00130 }
00131 
00132 //----------------------------------------------------------
00133 void
00134 GrPolygonBSPTree::Save( UWriter& writer )
00135 {
00136         _root->Save( writer );
00137 }

00149         _root->GetLeaves( _leaves );

00152 //----------------------------------------------------------
00153 void
00154 GrPolygonBSPTree::Clean()
00155 {
00156         _leaves.clear();
00157         delete _root;
00158         _root = 0;
